title: First-order Transfer Function with Time Constant
description:
ISC_CTRL tests whether a sign IN is a control character, if IN is a controll
character, the function returns TRUE, if not the function returns FALSE.
Control characters are all characters with code < 32 or 127.
name: FT_PT1

input.name: in
input.description: The input signal for the transfer function.

input.name: T
input.description: The time constant for the transfer function.

input.name: K
input.description: The gain factor applied to the input signal. Default value is 1.0.

output.name: out
output.description: The output signal of the transfer function.
